definition: permanent/constant/fixed/usual/ordinary/rule (old)/one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes (䷟)
class/rank/grade/equal to/same as/to wait for/to await/et cetera/and so on/et al. (and other authors)/after/as soon as/once

sentences.english: To facilitate the calculation of commutators, we list identities.
sentences.chinese: 爲了便於計算對易子，我們列出一些恆等式。

sentences.english: A quad amplifier contains four identical circuit units.
sentences.chinese: 一臺四元組放大器包含四個恆等電路單元。

sentences.english: Also we will discuss some differential identities in semiprime ring.
sentences.chinese: 同時給出了半素環的微商滿足某些微分恆等式的結果。

sentences.english: In this paper, some combinatorial identities are proved based on binomial generating function.
sentences.chinese: 以二項式作爲生成函數，給出了幾個組合恆等式證明。

sentences.english: No need to dive right into memorizing geometric proofs and trigonometric identities.
sentences.chinese: 不必去專研記住幾何上的證明和三角恆等式。

sentences.english: Results It gives several identities on the character sums of polynomials.
sentences.chinese: 結果得出了幾個關於多項式特徵和的恆等式。

sentences.english: Its bi-Hamiltonian structures are constructed by using the trace identity.
sentences.chinese: 通過利用跡恆等式建立了其雙哈密頓結構。

sentences.english: Then an interesting identity and a corollary are given.
sentences.chinese: 給出了兩個有趣的恆等式和一個推論。

sentences.english: The essay points out a demonstration method to the poly-rational fraction identical theorem.
sentences.chinese: 本文對多元有理分式恆等定理，給出一種證明方法。

sentences.english: The characteristic equations of the two equations are identical .
sentences.chinese: 兩方程對應的特徵方程是恆等的。

sentences.english: In this paper, A fundamental identity for frames of subspaces is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了子空間框架的一個基本恆等式。

sentences.english: Simple enumeration method is a convenient method to prove identities in Boolean algebra.
sentences.chinese: 簡單列舉法是證明布爾代數恆等式的簡便方法。

sentences.english: We can construct the following sequence of identities.
sentences.chinese: 我們能夠得到下列一系列恆等式。

sentences.english: An identity involving letters is true for any set of numerical values of the letter in it.
sentences.chinese: 含有字母的恆等式對其中字母的任何一組數值都成立。
